name: Game: Jam!
description:
Developed for GUDEV Game Jam 5, February 2019
Story: Twins Lua and Leo can't agree on what type of jam to make, so they race to cook the one they want!

Controls: WASD, E to interact, IJKL, O to interact

Credit: Noel - Art & Programming, Dasha - Sound & Programming, Josh - Programming, John - Programming
